title: How Stacey Abrams Fell Again in Georgia Governorâ€™s Bid
description: In her second bid for governor, Stacey Abrams was dogged by complaints that she was distracted by her national ambitions and disconnected from voters at home.
dc:creator: Maya King and Reid J. Epstein

media:content.media:credit: Gabriela Bhaskar for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Stacey Abrams conceded to Brian Kemp on Tuesday, after raising and spending tens of millions of dollars on her second run for governor.
